item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong will be at the Xbox Gamescom booth this year
item.content:encoded:
Xbox has revealed all the games that will feature at its booth during Gamescom 2025, with the pleasant surprise that Hollow Knight: Silksong will be available to play, alongside the first public hands-on for the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X handheld gaming PCs, and plenty more besides.

Xbox has staked out its booth in Hall 7 of the Koelnmesse, which is close to the North entrance of the show.

People picking up a ROG Xbox Ally or ROG Xbox Ally X will be able to check out Hollow Knight: Silksong, Roblox, Sea of Thieves, and Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4 – more games will also be available at the Asus ROG booth. Microsoft will also heavily feature Grounds 2 – heading to Early Access and Game Preview today – Ninja Gaiden 4, some Indiana Jones and Age of Empires and Mythology events, and there’s a new city update and aircraft for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024.

A theater presentation for The Outer Worlds 2 will also be available, giving a look at the highly anticipated sci-fi RPG from Obsidian.

This parties will then be bringing the following playable demos:

  • Hollow Knight: Silksong
  • Borderlands 4
  • Onimusha: Way of The Sword
  • Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
  • EA Sports FC 26
  • Aniimo
  • There Are No Ghosts at the Grand
  • PowerWash Simulator 2
  • Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade
  • Final Fantasy XVI
  • Invincible VS
  • Super Meat Boy 3D
  • Cronos: The New Dawn
  • Mistfall Hunter

And there could be a few more surprises beyond that, too…

Source: Xbox Wire



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/07/29/hollow-knight-silksong-will-be-at-the-xbox-gamescom-booth-this-year/
